string.value: Cassandra says that she has something to tell you. Cassandra seems to know about everything going on in town. What could she want this time?
Cassandra seems to always be curious about what is going on. This time, she asks that you collect 100 Trivial Rumors dropped by monsters. Why is she so interested in rumors about other people...
You brought Cassandra 100 Trivial Rumors and received a Maple Scarf in return. Putting this around your neck should keep you warm and toasty!

Heeheehee, did you hear? I, Cassandra, know everything that goes on in town! I hear you've received a Bandana from a Maple Admin. It's a bit too red, but it's not bad. Don't you think you need a more fashionable item?
Since you've helped out a Maple Admin, you're probably well aware of this. But I hear you can get fun little stories from monsters. You seem like you have some time in your hands. Won't you help me?
I don't need any elaborate stories. I just need something to gossip about. If you bring me #b100 Trivial Rumors#k I'll give you a present that would go perfectly with your Bandana.
Fine, suit yourself. I can easily find someone else to help me. Hmph!

Wow, have you collected all of them already? Alright! Tee hee. Cassandra must know everything that goes on in town... Even Trivial Rumors! It makes absolutely no sense for someone else to know more than I do. Right?!

I'll give you this Scarf. The weather has been fickle, and that's when you have to be most careful about keeping yourself warm and free of germs. This is a thoughtful present from me to you, so accept it with gratitude!
How much longer must I wait for those Trivial Rumors? You've left me hanging for too long already...
